Docs.summary: A class that lets a VoiceInteractionService implementation interact with always-on keyphrase detection APIs.

remarks.para: A class that lets a VoiceInteractionService implementation interact with always-on keyphrase detection APIs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Content.Intent CreateEnrollIntent() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an intent to start the enrollment for the associated keyphrase.

remarks.para: Creates an intent to start the enrollment for the associated keyphrase. This intent must be invoked using . Starting re-enrollment is only valid if the keyphrase is un-enrolled, i.e. , otherwise should be preferred.

Docs.exception: if managing they keyphrase isn't supported. Callers should only call this method after a supported state callback on to avoid this exception.
if the detector is in an invalid state. This may happen if another detector has been instantiated or the hosting this detector has been shut down.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Content.Intent CreateReEnrollIntent() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an intent to start the re-enrollment for the associated keyphrase.

remarks.para: Creates an intent to start the re-enrollment for the associated keyphrase. This intent must be invoked using . Starting re-enrollment is only valid if the keyphrase is already enrolled, i.e. , otherwise invoking this may result in an error.

Docs.exception: if managing they keyphrase isn't supported. Callers should only call this method after a supported state callback on to avoid this exception.
if the detector is in an invalid state. This may happen if another detector has been instantiated or the hosting this detector has been shut down.

Docs.exception: if managing they keyphrase isn't supported. Callers should only call this method after a supported state callback on to avoid this exception.
if the detector is in an invalid state. This may happen if another detector has been instantiated or the hosting this detector has been shut down.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
